content.content: 1. (1) For the period from April 1, 1996 to March 31, 1997, amounts not exceeding a total of $45,472,376,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the operating and capital expenses of the public service, as set out in the Schedule, that are not otherwise provided for. 1997, c. 13, s. 1 (1). Votes and items (2) The money shall be applied in accordance with the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates. 1997, c. 13, s. 1 (2). 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 1997, c. 13, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 1997, c. 13, s. 3.  1997, c. 13, Sched. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the period from April 1, 1996 to March 31, 1997, amounts not exceeding a total of $45,472,376,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the operating and capital expenses of the public service, as set out in the Schedule, that are not otherwise provided for. 1997, c. 13, s. 1 (1).

Votes and items

(2) The money shall be applied in accordance with the votes and items of the estimates and supplementary estimates. 1997, c. 13, s. 1 (2).

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 1997, c. 13, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 1997, c. 13, s. 3.

1997, c. 13, Sched.

______________

Français
